# AAVO International - Agent Context (Concise)

## Overview
AAVO International is a premier wholesale food distributor in Japan, specializing in authentic Asian ingredients. We connect international producers with local restaurants and retailers.

## Core Offerings
- **Halal Meats**: Premium Goat, Mutton, Chicken (Frozen/Fresh).
- **Rice & Grains**: Basmati (1121 XXL), Jasmine Rice, various lentils (Daal).
- **Spices**: Whole and ground spices (Cardamom, Cumin, Masalas).
- **Essentials**: Instant noodles (Wai Wai), beverages, and dry goods.

## Key Information
- **Target Audience**: Restaurants, Grocery Stores, Wholesalers in Japan.
- **Delivery**: Nationwide shipping (Cool Takkyubin for frozen goods).
- **Location**: Chiba City, Chiba Prefecture.

## Navigation Structure
- `/`: Home (Overview, Featured Products)
- `/about`: Company Profile, Mission
- `/categories`: Browse Product Categories
- `/products`: Full Product List
- `/catalog`: Download Wholesale Catalog (PDF)
- `/contact`: Inquiry Form, Contact Info

## Contact
- **Phone/WhatsApp**: +81-80-7975-5742
- **Email**: aavointernational.com.jp@gmail.com
